welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oxon Hill, an enchanting city known for its historic landmarks and charming local community. We hope you take some time to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse Z
terminals.description: Concourse Z at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
